title: Microsoft Windows XP 7 in 1 German ink. Service Pack 3
description:
7 in 1 German ink. Service Pack 3
*Special CD*
DAY..........: 05/11/2008
SYSTEM.......: Windows
FILES COUNT..: CD / 42 x 15 MB
LANGUAGES....: German
SUPPLIER.....: Microsoft

RELEASE INFO
------------
Okay everyone! Here it is: Windows Xp
GERMAN with Service Pack 3 Build 5512
As promised by Microsoft this is the
Final Version of its Service Pack.

You want to know why this is a 7
(Seven)-in-1 (One) CD? Okay - there are
seven different versions of Windows XP
on it:
* Windows XP Home OEM
* Windows XP Home Retail
* Windows XP Professional OEM
* Windows XP Professional Retail
* Windows XP Professional Corporate
* Windows XP Home Retail AntiWPA patched
* Windows XP Profesional Corporate
EeePC compartible (Inst ~ 400 megs)

You can select on Boot Up, which Version
you want to install.

And the Best of all is: Both XP Home
and ProÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¦s OEM and Retail versions can
be installed without any need of a
Product Key. This is one of the features
of a slipstreamed SP3 install medium.

Oh and by the way: MSN Explorer has been
removed, since nobody i know really
needed it.

And for all SATA-Harddisk Users out
there: Intels AHCI Drivers
(Version 7.8.1012) has been integrated
as well.

It took nearly a hundred hours to build
this nasty bitch of a CD!

This is a very special release -
you wonÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¦t get it in this form in any
stores.
So have fun using it!

Oh and btw: Take a look into the ADDONS
folder - there you can find a keygen to
create some Windows XP Pro Retail and
Corp Keys as well as a list of Windows
XP Home Retail Keys.

Have fun!

Oh and by the way: This is just a
demonstration of what is possible with
the todays techniques - if you really
like this product, then go and buy your
very own personal licence of Mircosofts
Windows XP (TM).

HOW TO USE
----------
1) Unrar
2) Burn or mount .iso
3) Install and enjoy!
